thread.title: Ava Duvernay wore a gown by a Lebanese designer as a statement against the Muslim ban
thread.title_full: Ava Duvernay wore a gown by a Lebanese designer as a statement against the Muslim ban

author: Sonaiya Kelley
title: Ava Duvernay wore a gown by a Lebanese designer as a statement against the Muslim ban
text:
Oscars 2017 live updates: First award of the night goes to Mahershala Ali for 'Moonlight' Feb. 26, 2017, 5:48 p.m. 
The 89th Academy Awards are underway in Hollywood. Stay with us for all the winners and reactions (and to review what happened on the red carpet.) 
“La La Land” is in the lead with 14 Oscar nominations including actor, actress, director and picture. That ties the record shared with "All About Eve" and "Titanic." Also in the running tonight is "Arrival" and "Moonlight," each with eight nominations.
